Support HTML5

This includes removing the div scope on grid classes (span-#), applying
the reset to core HTML5 elements, and explicitly defining the rule
'display: block' for those elements.

Fixed clipping of ordinals for IE in an ordered list. Lighthouse Issue #15 (http://blueprintcss.lighthouseapp.com/projects/15318-blueprint-css/tickets/15)

Bugfixes
Fixes #20 ("Typo on line 26 of src/grid.css")
First draft of bundled tutorial on BP.
BP Compressor copies over folders/files when including custom plugins.  Resolves Issue 89 (http://code.google.com/p/blueprintcss/issues/detail?id=89)
Handled custom stylesheets that don't assign any styles (e.g. .class {} or div.warn, h3 {})
Fixed problem with File.string_to_path where path directory doesn't exist yet
Added styles in custom grid generator to allow for setting span-# on input, select, and textarea elements
Scoped Blueprint classes within a namespace and added RDoc documentation
Updated files for 0.7.1 release.
Covered generic error to handle issues between conventions of requiring gems within the GridBuilder
Fixed an issue where the two clearfix rules were applied in the wrong order.
Fixed issue where tt was block, not inline as it should be.
Updated tutorial and typo in readme.
Updated release date for 0.7.
Fixed IE6 bug where margin wasn't removed on span-total.
Fixed bug where left should be right.
Removed background color from em, dfn. Not our job to choose styling colors.
Added default width to tables, as this is by far the most common value.
Added position:relative to push/pull to keep skewed content on top of anything else.
Modified plugins to only be included on screen or print when media-unspecific file (plugin name instead of screen or print) plugin css file is found.
Updated semantic class parser to now parse against div.span-# and other selectors.  Updated settings YAML to reflect ability to include plugins.
Removed change that was rolled back.
Lots of issues closed. See issue tracker / latest.
Reverted default font size to 12px, to make baseline work perfectly. Updated file path to fancy-type in sample page.
renamed plugin for use with the compressor
Added ability to include plugins in output CSS
Removed column class from example, since it's no longer needed.
Made form elements fit into a default span width.
Added some basic comments to validator.
Updated ie.css with the new levels of pull/push.
Fixed destination path error
Added note on grid.css.erb in grid.css source file.
Improved code for generating span rules.
Some clarifications in docs.
Structured tutorial links in readme.
Added credits for original idea to AUTHORS.
Improved header comment in compressed files.
Imrpoved consistency of spacing in docs.
Turned validator badge into a local file.
Moved all credits into a single file.
Removed .column from test files.
No more need for .column.. div + .span-x implies .column anyway.
Fixed a few minor CSS issues.
Added active contributors to readme.
Fixed semantic class names to pick up current grid assignments from output screen.css; was reading from default screen.css regardless of custom grid.
Improved spacing in readme.
Updated changelog, readme for 0.7
Added W3C validator back in
Core rearranging of files/modification of path settings in blueprint.rb
Updated file references in compressed css header.
changed push, pull count back to number of cols
changed irectory references from scripts to lib
changed scripts to lib, to conform with standard conventions
proper naming of docs, moved to root folder.
Changed push/pull count to half the number of columns. Updated header comment in grid.css and grid.css.erb.
Fixed wrong folder name in validator.
Fixed a couple simple problems with Windows handling file generation, and handled Gem::LoadError within the grid.png builder
Moved compress.rb to standard options using OptionParse, added code to generate grid if ImageMagick and RMagick are installed, cleaned up classes
Modified semantic classes to use full strings instead of prepending a '.' to assume a CSS class assignment.  Also makes for id'ed element selection as well as multiple element assignment on one line.
Added ability to define semantic classes within the settings yml file; stripped out whitespace at the end of CSS files.
Reverted test files that got committed with namespace
Fixed custom layout push/pulls to generate classes for up to half total number of columns; tweaked CSS .span-# class widths for custom layouts.
Fixed math on .span-# class; .span-1 is width: column_width, everything else is column_width + gutter_width.
Fixed the require in compressor.rb to escape the period instead of use it as a wildcard (which was trying to include grid.css.erb)
Fixed file name from grid.erb.css to grid.css.erb, and changed custom_layout.rb to reflect file name change.

Added custom layout functionality; users can define column count, column width (in px), and gutter width (in px) within their custom settings.yml file to create custom grids.  scripts/compress.rb has complete documentation as to how to go about implementing this new feature.
Re-compressed after added linebreaks.
Fixed output of compressed file to have different spacing/line breaks to be cleaner
Updated compressed files with the new and awesome compressor.

Added ability to store project settings in settings.yml and pass PROJECT=projectname instead of passing in LOCATION and NAMESPACE.  This allows easier output to different filepaths if being used as a single generator for multiple sites.
a few reverts

Removed scripts and docs folder for more conventional folder structure of having LICENSE, README, and CHANGELOG within root folder and used lib for Ruby files.  Validation core files (jars and the like) were not modified, just copied to the new folder.  Compression and validation classes were rewritten to be much more object-oriented instead of procedural.

Modified compress.rb to accept LOCATION and NAMESPACE; generated files can be output to a designated path.  If a designated path is used, it will also look for my-(ie|screen|print).css and compress/append that to its respective CSS file.
Increased default font size to 80%, extracted current_namespace function in namespace.rb
Converted tabs to spaces.
Polished a few comments.

r1925@macbook-pro:  glenn | 2007-08-29 09:48:06 -0700
 Added initial version of Changelog.txt with some historical info.  Please track all changes here in the future.

-- Corrected some typo's (nod to Louis Walch)
-- Added /* EOF */ comments to the files, where appropriate.
[Restructuring]:  Initial restructuring of repository in order to separate out the various parts of Blueprint CSS and allow for future developments.
